name: Horizon Facility
description:
Horizon Facility is an Experimental First-Person Puzzle Game with a very unique gameplay element at its core.

You can carry and throw objects around, but be aware that certain objects, when moved or thrown, leave a trail of replication behind. Exploit this behaviour to solve different puzzles in this short prototype.

Controls:

  • Standard first-person movement
  • Hold LMB to interact, grab, and carry physics objects
  • Press RMB to throw carried objects
  • Press R to quick restart the level
  • Press ESC to pause
